name: AAGH Kart
description: AAGH Kart is a new set-your-best-time kart racing game originally designed as part of AAGH Games' 2016 Extra Life project. Take your kart and beat the other racers, but more importantly, beat your best time. Strive for the perfect racing line, hitting speed boosts while dodging kart-slowing puddles and snow piles in search for that elusive new record.
